profile:
Imperial General Contractor is a fully licensed and insured company. Our staff is union trained for their trade, safety certified. We specialize in structural load-bearing walls. Our customer satisfaction is our goal. We choose the best materials for their project at the best price. We do what we write in our contract.

Certified Framer and Handyman

profile:
10% OFF FOR CUSTOMERS DOING HOME RENOVATIONS!!!

Welcome to GC Contracting
Our commitment to your project is reflected in the over 20 years committed from learning from master trade and journeymen.  We will execute on your desired outcome while being transparent and enlightening  on the process.
We love what we do and it will show in the quality and craftsmanship. 
Contact us today to see what is possible.
